SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Repeat Purchase stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {above} the Repeat Purchase stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Taste Testing?
VE.A: The value of stage Taste Testing is {4523}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Repeat Purchase?
VE.A: The value of stage Repeat Purchase is {1003}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {4523}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Repeat Purchase, with a value of {1003}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {698} Thousand Bottles from stage In-Store Promotion to stage Customer Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase?
SC.A: Decreased by {166} Thousand Bottles from stage Customer Purchase to stage Repeat Purchase.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {1410} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 3818? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1086? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1518 and 2079? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase, or from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {In-Store Promotion} to {Customer Purchase} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage Customer Purchase to Repeat Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to stage {Launch in Market} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Taste Testing} and {Launch in Market} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Customer Purchase} and {Repeat Purchase} stages.
